title: ArchiFlow: Event-Driven AI Agent Framework
subtitle: A Production-Ready Framework for Software Architecture, Development & Code Review

slide_descriptions.title: ArchiFlow: Revolutionizing AI-Powered Development
content: Production-ready, event-driven AI agent framework
Message queue architecture inspired by RabbitMQ
Complete software development lifecycle automation
Multi-agent collaboration with loose coupling
slide_descriptions.image_prompt: Clean, modern technology presentation slide with the ArchiFlow logo prominently displayed. Abstract circuit board patterns in the background with flowing data streams connecting nodes. Professional blue and white color scheme with geometric shapes representing AI agents and message flow. Subtle gradient effects with a futuristic feel while maintaining corporate professionalism.

visual_elements.layout: Centered title with supporting text below

slide_descriptions.title: The Challenge: Modern Development Complexity
content: Fragmented tooling across development lifecycle
Manual handoffs between product, architecture, and code
Inconsistent quality assurance and review processes
Limited automation for complex workflows
slide_descriptions.image_prompt: Illustration showing disconnected development stages with visible gaps. Left side shows product planning tools, middle shows architecture diagrams, right shows code editors - all separated by broken bridges or gaps. Use frustrated developer silhouettes trying to connect the pieces. Color-coded stages with red X marks showing failed connections.

slide_descriptions.title: Our Solution: Event-Driven Architecture
content: Central Message Broker with pub/sub topics
All communication through message queues (no direct coupling)
Session-specific isolated communication channels
Scalable, testable, and extensible design
slide_descriptions.image_prompt: Central hub design with a prominent Message Broker at the center. Multiple spokes radiate outward to different components (CLI, Agents, Runtime, Storage). Show message flow arrows with different colors for different topic types. Clean geometric design with smooth curves showing data flow. Include pub/sub symbols and topic labels.

slide_descriptions.title: Core Message Queue Architecture
content: Multi-backend storage: InMemory, File-based, Append-Only Log
Performance: 10,000+ messages/second throughput
<1ms latency for pub/sub operations
Thread-safe with full asyncio support
slide_descriptions.image_prompt: Technical diagram showing the Message Broker architecture with three storage backends represented as different modules. Include performance metrics displayed as gauge charts or speed indicators. Show threading symbols and asyncio icons. Clean technical drawing style with labels for each component. Include small performance benchmark graphs.

slide_descriptions.image_prompt: Five distinct avatar-style icons arranged in a circular formation. Each icon represents a different agent type with unique visual characteristics: Product Manager with target symbol, Tech Lead with building blocks, Coding Agent with code brackets, Code Review Agent with magnifying glass, Codebase Analyzer with charts. Modern flat design with consistent style but unique colors and symbols for each role.

slide_descriptions.title: Complete Development Lifecycle Workflow
content: Phase 1: Ideation & Requirements with Product Manager
Phase 2: Architecture & Design with Tech Lead
Phase 3: Implementation with Coding Agent
Phase 4: Quality Assurance with Code Review Agent
Phase 5: Continuous Improvement with Analyzer
slide_descriptions.image_prompt: Linear workflow diagram showing five connected phases. Each phase represented by a box with the corresponding agent icon inside. Arrows between phases showing handoff process. Include deliverables flowing between phases (PRDs â†’ Architecture â†’ Code â†’ Reviews â†’ Metrics). Clean flowchart style with consistent colors progressing from left to right.

slide_descriptions.title: Technical Excellence: Performance & Quality
content: 78 comprehensive test files with full coverage
40% reduction in LLM token usage through optimization
100+ concurrent agent sessions supported
CI/CD integration with SARIF and Reviewdog formats
slide_descriptions.image_prompt: Metrics dashboard showing performance charts and quality indicators. Include bar charts for test coverage, pie charts for token optimization, gauge for concurrent sessions, and CI/CD integration badges. Clean dashboard layout with graphs, numbers, and trend lines showing positive metrics. Use green for success metrics and blue for technical indicators.

slide_descriptions.title: Enterprise-Ready Features
content: Security sandbox with isolated tool execution
Proxy support for corporate environments
Multiple AI providers: OpenAI, Anthropic, GLM
Cross-platform support (Linux, macOS, Windows)
No telemetry - all processing stays local
slide_descriptions.image_prompt: Enterprise security and feature showcase. Include security shield icon, proxy server illustration, AI provider logos (OpenAI, Anthropic, GLM), operating system icons (Linux penguin, macOS apple, Windows logo), and a local processing indicator. Clean corporate style with feature badges and trust indicators.

visual_elements.layout: Feature grid with icons and badges

slide_descriptions.title: Developer Experience: Rich CLI Interface
content: Interactive REPL with auto-completion
System commands integration (! prefix and auto-detection)
Session persistence across restarts
Platform-specific command mapping
Debug logging with file output
slide_descriptions.image_prompt: Terminal interface screenshot showing the ArchiFlow REPL in action. Include command prompt with auto-completion suggestions, system command examples (!), session indicators, and colorful output with rich formatting. Show terminal with dark theme and syntax highlighting. Include multiple command examples to demonstrate the rich feature set.
